content.detailedDescription: I was walking on the boardwalk on mission beach and looked up to see what at first seemed like an unusual airplane.  the lights were all white and in a strict v formation - very different than a typical airplane's lights.  the object looked very large and moved at a high rate of speed.  it was very high up and vanished after 6-8 seconds as it passed behind a street light and could no longer be seen.  very unusual and memorable event - i hope others that may have seen this will report their sitings here.
content.summary: Triangular white lights flying at a high rate of speed and then vanishing

content.detailedDescription:
November 13, 2007 approximately 11:30 pm on an unseasonably warm fall night.

http://img250.Imageshack.Us/img250/585/ufopsdyc2.Jpg

that is the crude drawing i made of what i saw about 10 minutes after seeing it. 

i was at my friend's house, a few of us got together to play some ping pong and hang out. none of us were drinking or using drugs. everyone else was inside and it was me and my friend matt outside having a smoke and talking about college football. i was standing on the ground in the yard angled toward him, he was on the back porch facing away from the house and away from what i saw. i just noticed the formation out of the corner of my eye as i was smoking a cigarette and then i turned toward it to my left. as soon as i saw it i pointed at the sky and yelled "what the #^#$ is that dude?" he was facing the other direction, up on a porch, and in that 1-2 second span that it took him to get down off the porch the lights got smaller until they disappeared completely. he did not get to see them. he knew that i was serious though from my tone of voice and expression when i said something like "they were in formation!"

the lights were not high above my head, they were well above the horizon, probably about halfway from the horizon to the top of the sky. they were small and elongated horizontally. they were not crisp edges like in my drawing, they were sort of radiating and blurred around the edges. there were 7 or 8 of them, i am not sure if there was just one light at the top of the formation. the way they disappeared was almost like a "fizzle". they shrank to pinpoints from their original flared appearance and then disappeared completely. i should note that unlike in my rough drawing these lights were exactly perfect in relation to one another - meaning, all distances between and across were perfectly measured. they were all exactly the same size. also, i cannot say for sure whether or not they were moving because i only viewed them for a few seconds at best. they could have been moving very slowly as i saw them. i am actually inclined to believe that they were moving very slowly. 

i live very close to the 45th parallel in northern michigan, near lake huron. these lights were exactly south.
content.summary: 7 or 8 oval lights in formation

content.detailedDescription:
I am a mufon member. i reported another observation a few years ago of an object i observed in 2/1966. as i was driving home, easterly, and about .5 miles from my driveway, i observed a cluster of intense lights to the nw of my position. moving to the se. thought at first it was an aircraft, but it had r/g/b lights. not the usual r/g/w of aircraft.
when i pulled into my driveway i was going to run into the house to get my binoculars. but as soon as i got out of my car, i saw it was right behind my house, above the woods. it was moving silently to the ne at maybe 15 mph. i estimate it was no more than 100 yards away. hard to judge height because it was so dark. my guess was it was well below the 500 foot faa minimum. i observed it for approximately 20 seconds before i decided to make a dash for the binoculars. even though they were right inside my back door, when i returned with the binoculars the object was gone. the lights were in a chevron shaped configuration. instead of jumping back into the car, i ran down the road about 100 yards to see around the woods. i saw it in the distance, but it was too far away to see any detail even with the binoculars.
within a minute i heard the sound of a jet going into re-heat to the se of me. wether it was an aircraft scrambled to intercept, or on normal maneuvers, i do not know.
they do use the area over lake huron to the east for mock combat, but in 3 years living here i never heard or saw them do it in the dark. only during daylight hours.
i live in an area that is fairly unpopulated. nearest occupied home is about .5 miles from me. at the time there was no moon, but mostly clear skies. very little, if any ,ambient light in the area. it was quite black out. wind was from the sw at 10-15 mph.
if the b light was in front of craft,the direction of flight,then the r/g light position were opposite of what they should be on normal aircraft. no local airports within 20 miles of my house. i am fairly sure the closest is a vfr airport with no operational night lights.
after i settled my nerves, i timed and retraced my movements to get the total time of the event. i think about 1 minute of the total time was what i spent actually looking at the object.
content.summary: Observed chevron shaped object with r/g/b lights moving slowly at close range

content.detailedDescription:
While looking at the stars, on my patio, suddenly i saw a long, brightly lit, white lighted, elongated, cigar shaped object,(solid), appear from nowhere, flashing across the sky, lasting about a second, ... completely silent, passing into a cloud, and not emerging from behind it, where i lost sight of it. it appeared from a point of north-east, heading south-west.. when the thing first emerged out of nowhere, i was stunned, as it was too low and too fast and too silent for an airplane,... yet i could clearly see its shape.

earlier this evening, while also looking at the stars, i was looking at a triangular star constellation that appears every night in the sky, and i call it "the little kite" (i am not an astronomer, so i call it what it looks like); then, i looked away for a moment; then, when i looked back at the little kite, i suddenly saw a fourth star within its triangle- line, wondering how that could be, whereof the fourth star suddenly began moving and at the approximate speed of an airplane, yet completely silently; it too came from north-east, heading south-west; ..I was following the little "star" intently with my eyes, realizing stars don't travel across the sky, leaving their constellation... the sighting lasted about 15 seconds, at which point i lost sight of it due to distance.

something strange is going on in the skies...

also, there is a very bright star showing up lately every night here, flashing lights of a very light bright blue, followed by bursts of orange and white... sometimes the orange is a red; ..It is very energetic and no other star does that (which is why i am compelled to watch it every night); i don't know what it is, maybe a satelite? it is not a star, as it flashes vivid colors like no other star; it also moves its position, but very slowly; -what is it? it's position from the front of my house is north-east.
content.summary: Two sightings in one evening

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was in mexico city at the teotihuacan pyramids at 11:25 and was just taking random pics of the pyramids, this was on november 9, 2007. she realized nothing at the time, only noticed when uploaded pics to computer (pics 15 & 20).

on november 11, my wife was walking through tequisquiapan at 16:45 and was taking pictures of the monolith. at the time she was taking the pictures she didn't see anything unusual and again only noticed when uploaded pics to computer(pic 100).
 
i believe these objects are the all the same object even though it was two different days. i was just wondering if you had any idea on what you think they might be. i find picture # 100 is the best for clarity. there all hard to see and must be zoomed in, but once there zoomed in there quite clear. the reason i first noticed is because on picture # 100 theres a black circle and above the spot i saw a bright blue spec, this one is the only picture with the black circle. if you find these pictures of interest i have more of the same object.
           
                                         thank you

I was outside around 4 pm in the afternoon, taking down clothes, as i was walking around to the front of the house. my daughter who was then about 7 years old, told me there was something wrong with her eyes because she kept seeing spots in front of them. i humored her and looked to the sky and there were four round objects in the sky. you could see little windows in them. i dropped the laundry basket and said "what the hell is that?"they were flying above the tree tops, with no noise.They were flying very fast. my daughter replied "i told you i was seeing spots in front of my eyes" i told my daughter to go get her brother as no one would believe me and think i was crazy. as i was watching them i was reasoning that it could not be birds as the sun would not  reflect off of them.They could not be planes as they were silent and skimmed the tops of the trees.  suddenly as we were all watching them. three of them went to form a point for a triangle, the fourth one was on the side flying along. we looked back to the spot where we first spotted them and there were six more of them flying along without sound. we watched them as they formed a diamond with four of them at each point and two on each side. i was trying to rationalize what i had just seen. weather balloons cannot make shapes in the sky. we were all in shock of seeing these little circles in the sky. we finally watched them until you could no longer see them in the sky. i am sorry to say that we have no pictures or recordings of it.
content.summary: round objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking the dog, alone.  i noticed overhead what i initially thought was a plane (local airport is nearby) but realized it was too big and too silent.  if the plane were that large, it would  have been very loud. there was no noise.  so i looked more closely.  i noticed what seemed like square panels of light on what i thought ws the bottom of the flying object.  i do not think they were blinking, but can't be sure.  


it was directly overheard,but seemed very high up (not close to me, or the trees). it sped away very quickly.  as it moved away i
1) started running trying to follow it  and 2) as it got farther away, i thought, is that a bird soaring?  for a bit i thought maybe i was really confused and a bird was soaring overhead being lit up by the street. 

i was trying to put it in some real context, figure out what it was, what i was seeing.    

but i am sure it wasn't a bird, it shot away so fast -- it was big overhead and then in the course of a minute was minute (as in tiny)... as it seemingly flew south.  

because there was no real way to judge distance, the only thing that was remarkable was how quickly it grew small in the sky, but it wasn't shrinking. i am fairly sure it was flying due south.  

i knew it was a ufo and was not scared, only excited.  it was so very real, i started running, with the dog on the leash looking up to the sky.  i was running with a grin on my face, as it seemed so 1)safe and 2)extra terrestrial.  

it grew dim and small so fast, i tried to keep my eye on it -- but it was dark, i had the dog on the leash and i had to slow down and look down. it was then that i lost sight of it.

it was such a brief period of time, but i knew what i saw and came home and promptly told my family that i'd seen a ufo.  

i am 50 years old, a very sane, employed female.
content.summary: Evening siting of silent boomerang shaped lighted object overhead

content.detailedDescription:
It was a story publicated in our local newspaper la nueva provincia. (here is the complete url direction: http://www.Lanueva.Com/edicion_impresa/nota/nc/11/11/2007/7bb006.Html )(this note is in spanish)

the aproximate translation is: two cops were going around near the city of oriente (more or less 200km from bahia blanca) at 1.30pm when they saw a white light that illuminated all around. then, the light grew and became grey. near the police car, they saw a little-men-like-things of 80cm hight and big dark eyes near the light. one of the cops said that he couldn���t move, and his partner were outside the car. he saw another things going outside from the ufo (two were like the first he saw and another a little big than others.When the second cop returned to car, he started to cry and the beings returned to ship and flew away. the cops reported that the ship (or light) had a green halo and a withe light that taked a while to extinguish (they reported that green halo was like a rocket flame, perhaps. my english is limited. sorry!)

the article continues saying that the same light was seen on another place near there, by another policeman lt. santiago walter. 

please check this article. thanks.
content.summary: Encounter of third type.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking photos of a storm that was moving into the area. i was standing in a walmart parking lot in downers grove, il. i did not load these photos onto my computer until a couple of months later. when i was loking at the photos i noticed something on one of them and my first thought was, "what is that?" i zoomed in on the object and it is definitely not a bird or an airplane. i will submit the photo to you for you to look at. i have submitted it to nuforc before. i just found this website and thought i would submit it to you. 

this is not my first experience of sightings. i could tell you many stories my family and i have had with sightings of ufo's. there have been some i would give anything to be able to go back and experience and have a camera with me to catch it on film.

the photo i will attach will be normal and an inverted one. the inverted one will show the ufo in white against the dark sky.
content.summary: Captured ufo unknowingly while taking photos of storm clouds

content.detailedDescription: Here is another web cam pic from this web site http://www.Phoenixvis.Net/esmo1/index.Html this is the second sighting in a few days.Ufo? you decide.
content.summary: Another web cam ufo in estrella mts az

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were coming home from the backsides of fallon naval air station. we had been xraying jets for the navy farther out in the desert. as we got into the vehicle we use for transport, we saw a bright oval shaped object in the air directly in front of us. well working on the flight line for 25 years we are used to such, but this one looked funny, and my friend and myself are both pilots, so what happened next was bizarre. as we watched for a good 5 minutes, this object scooted about the sky doing impossible flying, (or so i thought up until now) moving thousands of feet in split seconds. although we were relatively close, we could hear no sound either. as this sighting came to a close, this object accelerated to the left at about 45 degrees and just disappeared in a streak of light. we both looked at each other and laughed, of course the old joke about "i didn't see anything" "you see anything?" later, we, and especially me was excited. i had finally seen a ufo.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw a lighted object that flew erratically

content.detailedDescription:
Object appear to be in reentry leaving a large trail at a high speed very meteor like. i almost thought it was a missle but it was coming downwards very fast, also a fuel tank or even a space shuttle.The part that surprised me the most was that all the sudden as if it had reached a certain point the trail stopped and i could see a dim shinny object come out of it and stand somewhat still, i was traveling down the i-15 at 80mph so it was hard to judge the speed but it dissapeared after that.I assumed that the object had burned in space but to see something that resemble a spacecraft come out of that cloud and move like a craft really got my heart pumping!
blessings
rob
content.summary: Bullet like object flying at high altitude leaving trail and then disapearing

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to a wedding with my brother-in-law who was to be the father of the groom.  we needed to get to a part of queens and i decided to take bay parkway in brooklyn to get to the belt parkway.  when we were still yet a very good distance from the belt pkwy. when my brother-in-law frank asked me what that was while pointing ahead up towards the sky.  at first i found it hard to see, but thought that it was an air plane that would come into better view soon, but it never did.  it was high up and just hovering.  then frank thought it was a kite, but i knew it wasn't.  too high up and no distinguishing formation.  it look like a silver metal ball that was reflecting the sunlight, but when we got really close we could see that it was emitting its own light and had lights around the center and was luminous.  i didn't stay to continue to watch it cause i thought we would be late.  i even had a camera and failed to take the picture.  it was quite a treat to share with my brother-in-law.  i remember frank saying that he expected as we got closer to see a string hanging from it cause he thought from a distance back on the road that it was a kite, and was really bugging out when he didn't see one and began to see the luminous lights around its center.  i don't think anyone even noticed or paid any attention to it.

thank you,
charlie

it was over the water i would say, where shore road is near cesar's bay bazar, and we were going south on bay parkway when we saw it.
content.summary: Silver metallic luminous lights around center and hovering

content.detailedDescription:
My fianc��� and i both saw the ufo. i do not believe the ufo to have been any sort of craft, terrestrial or otherwise, though freddy is near a military base (cfb gagetown) so who knows. we were walking the gravel trails along the saint john river at night, headed west, perhaps slightly northwest. i had seen a shooting star earlier that night directly above us. this was probably a latecomer amongst the perseids from august. then, ahead of us and at a seemingly low altitude, and pretty close distance-wise as well, a bright green fireball entered and left our field of vision in about 3-5 seconds. it was moving quite quickly and of a distinctly spherical shape. whatever it was, it was certainly not a "normal" denizen of the night sky, esp. over harsh city lights.

my paint sketch depicts the view from southside freddy along the trail, with a bridge across the river, dotted with cars, in the foreground and the northside, dotted with lights, in the background. the ufo is in the sky and the red arrow indicates its route over about 3-5 seconds.
content.summary: Meteor-like green ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Higher than immediate atmosphere. latitude- 40 degrees 48.95 north. longitude- 81 degrees 56.27 west.
sitting on a wooden deck, looking up. straight up. my eyes adjusted somewhat after looking at sky for a few seconds. noticed a long cigar shape, way up above atmosphere. if they were in orbit, how could i see that far?, then. but anyway, a craft was sitting in space above me, it must have been huge if i could see it. after seconds ticked off, i kept staring. not long after, another craft, the same size, joined beside the first. the left craft (from my position, looking up)started to move west. and it continued west until it was out of sight. the first ship stayed in the same orbital position until i went in the house to get a drink. i was slightly shook. that's it. the sky was crystal clear.
content.summary: Cigar- very lengthy

content.detailedDescription:
I was working on the chrysler plant in belvidere, il at night moving cars from the plant to a large staging area ( parking lot ) on the grounds.  i watched two lights go over me toward the airport in rockford.  what i can not explain is the following:  first, the two lights were horizontal traveling toward the west to rockford. then as they headed away they did something that i will not forget ever in my life.  they two lights began to rotate to the vertical, this was what they looked like before:
a)  *     * 

and this is what they looked like after: b)   *


                                              *


they rotated from the "a" counter clockwise to the "b" position with the left side light dipping first.

and then the lights started to spread out at the same time ! so when it got to the vertical, they were 3 times or more spread farther apart!

i then pointed to the lights as the little van came to pick me up and a few guys asked what the hell i was doing pointing up in the air like that!  and i let them know what i saw.

now, the ups has a hub out there and a lot of their flights come over the plant in the middle of the night and i see the jets come over all the time, you hear them as they come in and as they head out to chicago.

i was just standing around in the cold, waiting for the little van to come and pick me up when i happened to look up at the lights when i seen the two lights.

i was in awe of what i seen.  and as a person who likes sci-fi, i think i was lucky enuff to see the two lights do what they did, with no sound at all.
content.summary: Two lights go over me

content.detailedDescription: Last night i witnessed an event that seemed out of the ordinary. just when it was dark (about 8pm)i heard several aircraft flying above the dolomite mountain range (just north of roverado in piano,italy) there were three aircraft (itaf tornados, 99%sure) flying at about 12000-14000 feet. i have not witnessed any aircraft before at this time of night fling exercises. they had their anticollision lights on and were flying south easterly following another smaller white light. after about one minute one of the aircraft broke formation and flew towards the southwest in an orbit. the other two aircaft sped up to intercept the light when it changed to a much larger size/bright orange and sped way out in front of them. it almost seemed like it was trying to see their pace ability until i lost sight of them. meanwhile the other aircraft that had split off had started to follow a sperate white light in its orbit. the white light then dissapeared from the sky. a few minutes later the aircraft met up in an area southeast of where they were before. another odd thing was one of the aircraft turned on their spotlight when they rejoined the formation. most european aircraft have these spotlights on the right side of the aircraft for aircraft id. the formation then seemed to search the area of the sky then return to the south. durning my observation which lasted about 10 minutes there was a lot of afterburner noise from the aircraft. i am an experienced flyer in the military, and i have a lot of experience identifying aircraft by sound and behavior. this is the first time i have witnessed a chase event. hopefully this description is clear to all that is reading. please contact me if you would like more info. thank you!
content.summary: Ufo's being chased by italian af

content.detailedDescription:
We have a summer home in the mountains of dixie national 
forest and on one of our trips back to the city we saw a triangular shaped object in the sky. it had red and green lights an seemed to have eerie steem lines coming down from the craft. when it left we noticed we had lost about 15 mins. that we could not account for. 
after that i had a headache for a few days.
content.summary: Traveling down hwy.14 from duck creek when we lost time after seeing a triangle shaped  object in the sky. we also lost 15mins. on the hwy 15 after leaving cedar city going back to st. george.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out to my car to go to work, it was probably about 7:30 or 8:00am; the sky was blue and very clear. as i walked through the yard to get to my car parked in the street, i glanced up in the sky above me and saw a round object sitting perfectly still very high above. i remember the object having a shiny silver color and i also remember seeing detail underneath. from my perspective it appeared to be the size of a nickel or a quarter, but very high. the object disappeared almost immediately, it did not fly away, it just vanished; it almost looked like "oops, he saw us." i did a double take while i continued to the car, the object was not there. i got in, drove to work and continued my day like nothing had happened. i can't remember very much because this happened so long ago. what's bothering me is the fact that i suppressed the memory.

i don't know why so many years later the memory has returned and it is stuck in my head as though it happened yesterday. i remember around that time having an abduction type nightmare. i accepted the dream that night as having been a bad dream and nothing more, and the memories of that nightmare never left me so i'm not as bothered by the nightmare as i am by the silver circle in the sky. the object above the house was real and my recent memory of it has me wondering if i'm going nuts (lol).

i have recently been reading up on ufo stories and trying to find similar stories on-line. i read where people have gone to psychiatrist and the therapist have brought up suppressed memories. i have also heard reports on talk shows and news reports of therapist bringing up suppressed memories of abuse cases. i have not been to a therapist and have not discussed my recent recollection with anybody whatsoever. this is the first time i am talking about it and it is only because i stubled across a site that asked me to tell the story.
content.summary: I looked up and saw a circle above my house one moment, the next it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: Ex-husband and i were coming from el paso in a blue mini truck we came thru carlsbad thru artesia thru loco hills n.M minutes after leaving loco hills husband named jose mexican asked me if something was wrong and i said no and i asked why? and he said that something is wrong with the radio because the radio started making static noises and the station went out and he was messing with the stereo he was mad and turned it off and then he started complaining that it seemed as if the truck was going by itself he said it seemed as if the motor was turning but without the truck being on and he kept steping on the gas and the truck seemed to being going at the same speed we were going at about 70 miles the truck is standard and then all a sudden he turned to me and asked me if we were in a dream and i said no (i thought he just wanted attention) all the time we were traveling i was thinking to myself that if i should have gone back to him since we were recently seperated we were on our way to pick up some furniture that i had in lovington, nm im a lovington new mexico resident born and raised there so anyways he asked me to pinch him on his hand to see if we were not dreaming (i thought now he really wants attention) and he asked me if he can pinch me on my hand and i said yeah why? before he said anything he pinched me and of course it hurt and i said ouch! and i said what is wrong? and then he said dont be afraid he said on my left side look slowly out the window and he said to me am i seeing things or whatever is out the window is it really there? and i looked and sure enough there was a silver disk floating next to us as we were traveling it seemed to be looking at us as it followed us slowly he told me as we came to a curve make sure i dont lose sight of it as he paid attention to the road it seemed to go in front of us and within seconds it disappeared and we were amazed and speechless and we said to one another i wonder what that was as we neared maljamar on top of the mountains of caprock i spoted another ship (i dont think it was the same one) a much bigger it was moving across the mountain slowly this ship seemed to have some silver purpleish color and it also disappeared after a few minutes of looking at it maybe three minutes three to five minutes (i think) after it disappeared we came upon the curve of maljamar on top of the curve of maljamar to the left side we came upon a very huge ship!!! it was a pale color lighter than gray and it was floating or suspended in the air a few feet off the ground and my husband was scared! i asked him to pull over so we can look at it and he said no he did slow down we studied the ship for a minute or two and it disappeared and we drove to lovington confused and speechless and we lost an hour of time he also was mad at me because he said that i had told him that from artesia to lovington is 65 miles and we took two hours to get there and he did not want to talk about the incident any longer and up to this day whenever i see him he does not want to talk or mension anything about it. what i saw was real my family laughs at me and makes jokes. but to me it was the most amazing thing on earth i have ever seen, for the ship was very huge! there is a little more to my story but ill leave these words for now unspoken. the unspoken words are of dreams and going into the ocean in strange ships. but this is all for now. i do plan to write a book about it, but i am not a good writer. i believe we are not alone.
content.summary: I saw 3 diffrent ufos ,husband and were coming el paso came thru artesia n.M thru loco hills where sighting started a little after loco hills finished in maljamar n.M

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard star gazing when i saw this bright orange object comming from the north-west, at first i coundn't tell if it was a plane, because i could hear a faint noise, but as the object came closer i notice a plane behind it. as the object came closer it looked more narrow then an egg, and it was bright orange on the top and bottom and dark in the middle, and as it went by i could hear the plane very clearly but not any noise from the object, it lasted about 20 to 25 secounds and there were no blinking lights from the time i saw the object. only when the object, was just out of sight i could see a orange light blinking on the right side(towards the west), and the object headed south-west.
that about it.
content.summary: Orange object comming from the north-west to to the south-west no noise

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard star watching when i looked to the north-west, and saw a bright orange object headed south, at first i didn't know what it was  because i could hear a faint noise and thought it might be a plane.
as the object came closer i notice a plane quite a bit behind the object, and that was where the noise was comming from, as the orange object came closer it looked like a pill then a egg it was more narrow and almost transparent, it was darker towards the middle of the object and bright orange at the top and bottom and i could not hear any noise from the object. i belive the time was about 6pm, not quite sure and it just headed south-west. the plane was not following it.That was about 15 to 25 secounds and the object was gone.
content.summary: Object moving from north to south orange in color almost trasparent no noise

content.detailedDescription: I am 51 now.This event happened in rumson nj.I'm pretty sure it was june or july of 72.There is an apro report my parents gave with a drawing and description of the ufo as being as large as a 4 engine jet airplane.I found the report with help from a ufo website years ago and downloaded it,but the computer crashed and i lost the report.As i am aging i am getting memories of being abducted.We pulled into the parking lot behind the old high school.There was at least 25 people there...Some crying..Etc.Etc.I remember looking at it after getting out of the car.It was so close i could have hit it with a stone...Next thing i know i'm sitting in the car and asking my parents and brothers....Where did it go/..It was like time passed...Everyone was gone and the ufo was hovering over the oceanic bridge...Traffic was stopped..People staring and then it just took off....Very fast...We just said wow...Went to relatives we were visting..We were up from florida on vacation...Went to bed and almost forgot about it the next day,but my parents did make a report...I think with the asbury park press.Any help finding this report would be apreciated...Thanks...Steven abel
content.summary: Very large,very close

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of around june 5th, 1998 i was standing outside a music venue called "skrappy's" in tuscon az. i am still hazy on the date, but recall a well known band named rocket from the crypt was playing across town that night, so searching their tour records might shed some light on the exact date of the sighting.

at approximately 7:30pm az. time, i was staring up at the beautiful night sky outside the venue before the show. my body was facing west as i could see the last traces of light from the sunset that day. out of the east, at an alarming right of speed appeared a round ball of light a little brighter than your avg. star heading west. i could tell by my field of vision that it was at least 13,000 ft high and was not a bug flying a few feet over of me. it looked very out of place in the night sky due to its immense speed and trajectory, and thats what made me take notice.

it made an "s" like maneuver as it headed in a westerly direction until it was directly overhead at which time it stopped on a dime with almost no deceleration and made two perfect concentric circles about the size of a penny in a counter clock-wise motion. then it instantly shot out in a curve like path all the way to the western part of the sky disappearing over the horizon into the sunset.

the complete length of time it took the object to traverse the whole scope and view of the sky from horizon east to horizon west was around 3-4 seconds. one can only speculate what that rate of speed is. there were a few other people standing outside around the area at the time, but due to the rate of speed of the sighting/craft, it was apparently only witnessed by me that night.

i know that the object was not a shooting star or meteor, as they do not move like that. as well, this object had no debris trail. it was not any helicopter or aircraft that i am aware of. that kind of acceleration/deceleration would kill any living being on board using our current human technology.

i did not see the object for the rest of the night. i feel it was not of earthly origin and was benevolent.
content.summary: Tucson ufo light sighting

content.detailedDescription:
It was about a mile away near a jet engine powered power plant in a town called rathdrum id.  the object hung just above the tree tops and would climb and drop over and over. sometimes small lights would come and go from the object.  a few minutes after i saw this object (maybe 20-30) three planes flew over the area.  the ufo would disappear just long enough to avoid them.  the next day i notice two military helicopters, they flew around the general area for two days.  the only reason i bring this up is because their is never military helicopters in this area because there is no base around here.  

i was also wondering if anyone at mufon know about the submarine base in the lake at athol id i will attempt the spelling of the lake...Please don't judge me on this.  i think it is lake ponderillie, now i will try it the way it sounds.....Ponderay,

i worked on that base for a year and a half as a journeymen hvac supervisor.  i also lived in great falls mt from 1967 to 1996 and there was a lot of activity around there (malmstrom? afb. please contact me if you have anything to add.
content.summary: Bright color changing jelly fish shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was in northern minnesota camping with some friends in an area that is usually quite sparsely populated. it was late at night and i was looking north towards the big dipper. i am a somewhat experienced astronomer and i was observing the stars as it was a very clear night. as i gazed northward, a  black, triangular object that flew rather low to the ground flew out from the eastern half of my vision and made a slight southward curve as it crossed the sky directly above me. the craft was completely silent, and completely black, had it not been for the three bright white lights it is possible it would have been invisible. the craft made no noise at all, and made no attempt to hide itself. i first noticed the object because i saw the movement of it's lights against the background of the stationary stars, when i first saw the object i thought it was maybe a shooting star, but i almost immediately realized it could not have been as it had a distinct triangular shape and turned as it flew. after seeing the object i felt strange feelings of spprehension and perhaps a touch of fear and dread. my friend phil, also saw the same object. i lost sight of the object as it flew behind the treeline.
content.summary: A large black triangular shaped ufo with a single white light at each of the vertices.

content.detailedDescription: At a civil war re-enactment at anderson river park around 11:00pm i saw several bright spot-looking lights in the clouds. it lit the whole area up where we were camping. i waited for the thunder but there was absolutely no noise. thunder clap, helicopter or airplane sound. the lights were bright blue led looking diffused in the cloud cover. it was almost to bright to look at. they went from west to north east for 20 to 30 seconds. people around the camp fires started to ask what the heck was going on. it was raining lightly. several times at least 4 times the sky was lit up with the bright blue light straight over head turning the clouds so bright you could have read by it. the lights went over a bluff to the east and strobed bright blue for at least a minute. you could see all the details of the hills and trees on the ridge. someone said a transformer blew but there are no over head lines in the area and there was no noise. a lot of people was this. i have never seen such bright blue lites in my life. i have seen a lot of lightning storms but not a silent one that lit up everything for 10 to 30 seconds and move around so fast.When they stopped they never came back but someone said they saw lights like that the night before. they were in the clouds at a minimum of 500 to 1500 feet up. at one point they looked to be over 2000 feet in the clouds.
content.summary: Bright blue lights, then the whole sky was lit up several times ending in blue stobes all completly silent.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work. in the northwest part of vegas. i wasn't really doing anything but thinking of getting home. suddenly i noticed this giant light above me from my windshield. it looked like it was no higher than a helicopter would be surveying the area. but, once i looked and saw this giant light, before i knew it .. it zipped and raced off into the distance north into a dot of nothing in seconds!

i honestly first thought. that was a ufo. i have never seen one. i have never given much thought to them. or interest. in fact, two months before i told someone "i dont' think one way or the other, i believe anythign is possible. im just probably one of those people that will never see anything."

i just found out tonight. the day after that the ufo conference was here in las vegas. i still don't know if it could be a star or comet, being so close to the earth and going straight forward into some warp of speed into nothing.
content.summary: A giant ball of pure white light... high up above car then zipped and raced ahead into nothing.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 11, 2007 i went out to get some cat nip for my cat, at about 9:15.  i walked out on to the drive way, faceing (west) to see venus.  out of the south west, traveling quickly, four, red orange bright (like (neon) orbs headed my way, northeast.  as soon as i saw them i ran and got my husband.(it took 5 seconds, to and back to lights)  we watched them fly across the sky, equal distant apart,soundless.  they were low.  we watched them till they hit the tree line,(old oak trees) and could not see them anymore.   they looked like the size of a high moon, from ground to orb. speaking of moon, sighting was during darkside of moon. the orbs, were some what in the usual fight patterns of plane travel in our area. there were no other planes in the sky. 
we are baby boomers, we have seen alot of things in the sky but nothing like this.  we tried to use reason to explain what we saw to ourselfs. we thought maybe because they were in  the flight pattern, they flew in for the air show.  we wondered if they were dropping something off at argonne national lab. weather ballowns even, but how come if they were,no one reported seeing them.
we asked others in our area if anyone had seen any thing, but they only looked at us funny.  we found nothing about it in the paper or on the radio the next day. we could not beleive no one had seen it and reported it to the news, local even.  but, then again we hadn't either.  (it's not like your in the phone book.)  i tried to call w.G.N. next day, but called at the wrong time, and was not well recieved. did not call back.  people when we told them were not comfortable hearing about it.  so were are not comfortable with telling it.  i just wanted to know what it was.  but, i will say this.  i am glad i saw it. we do not feel the need to prove it to anyone, because to us, it was very cool finialy seeing something that you could say, with out a doubt, what you had seen was a ufo to you.  i am not saying they were from outer space, all were are saying is, we have never seen anyting like this in the sky before.  
we did not take pictures of it. but, when i went to the national ufo reporting web sight, the sighting seen in portland, is what we saw, only four of them and alot closer.  and that is why i am reporting this to you now.  thanks for your time.
content.summary: Saw four orbs ,red, orange center. neon like.  traveling low in sky, equal distant apart. no sound.
